sentences.en: But can finance subsist, being completely divorced from physical economy?
sentences.cn: 但是,金融果真能够完全脱离实体经济而独立存在 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't worry about your children whom I can subsist.
sentences.cn: 别担心你的孩子们,我可以供养他们.

sentences.en: Everything on earth wants to subsist, and should respect each other.
sentences.cn: 万物都想生存 、 应当相互尊重.

sentences.en: He could subsist on bark and grass roots in the isolated island.
sentences.cn: 在荒岛上他只能靠树皮和草根维持生命.

sentences.en: How can you subsist on such a small income?
sentences.cn: 这么点收入你可怎么生活呀?

sentences.en: How do they manage to subsist?
I was very sorry to tell him that the little I had would not subsist.
sentences.cn: 我很抱歉地告诉他我所有的一点款子不够维持我们的生活.

sentences.en: Many people in the world have to subsist on $ 1 a day.
sentences.cn: 世界上的许多人每天收入仅仅1美元.

sentences.en: Old people often subsist on very small incomes.
sentences.cn: 老人往往靠十分微薄的收入艰难度日。

sentences.en: People in the far north subsist chiefly ( mainly ) on fish and meat.
sentences.cn: 居住在遥远北方的人们主要以鱼类和肉类为生.

sentences.en: People in the far north subsist chiefly on fish and meat.
sentences.cn: 居住在极地的人们主要依靠鱼和肉维持生活.

sentences.en: Spleen can subsist on any kind of food.
sentences.cn: 怒气可以依靠任何食物存活下去.

sentences.en: Squirrels subsist on nuts during the winter.
The anguish of life can mask calm subsist really with adamancy?
sentences.cn: 人生的痛苦真的可以用坚强去掩盖镇定的活下去 吗 ?

sentences.en: The living things on the earth could not subsist on Mars.
sentences.cn: 地球上的生物不可能在火星上生存.

sentences.en: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day.
sentences.cn: 犯人一天三次靠一杯最差的粥维持生活。

trans.tran_cn: 生存下去； 继续存在； 维持生活
trans.tran_en: to stay alive when you only have small amounts of food or money

trans.tran_cn: （靠很少的钱或食物）维持生活，生存下去
trans.tran_en: to stay alive when you only have small amounts of food or money
